mapper.insert: insert into international_conference( contact_position, contact_phone, recommended_experts, contact_name, conference_name, conference_topic, holding_time, holding_address, field, organizer, `scale`, create_year, closing_date, times, collection_paper, search_situation, web_address, recommended_reason, institutional_name, GUID, approval_status, company_number, signUp_time, template_number, association_number, reviewer, reviewer_number, review_time ) values( #{contact_position}, #{contact_phone}, #{recommended_experts}, #{contact_name}, #{conference_name}, #{conference_topic}, #{holding_time}, #{holding_address}, #{field}, #{organizer}, #{scale}, #{create_year}, #{closing_date}, #{times}, #{collection_paper}, #{search_situation}, #{web_address}, #{recommended_reason}, #{institutional_name}, #{GUID}, #{approval_status}, #{company_number}, #{signUp_time}, #{template_number}, #{association_number}, #{reviewer}, #{reviewer_number}, #{review_time})

insert into national_conference( contact_position, contact_phone, recommended_experts, contact_name, conference_name, conference_topic, holding_time, holding_address, field, organizer, `scale`, create_year, closing_date, times, collection_paper, search_situation, web_address, recommended_reason, institutional_name, GUID, approval_status, company_number, signUp_time, template_number, association_number, reviewer, reviewer_number, review_time ) values( #{contact_position}, #{contact_phone}, #{recommended_experts}, #{contact_name}, #{conference_name}, #{conference_topic}, #{holding_time}, #{holding_address}, #{field}, #{organizer}, #{scale}, #{create_year}, #{closing_date}, #{times}, #{collection_paper}, #{search_situation}, #{web_address}, #{recommended_reason}, #{institutional_name}, #{GUID}, #{approval_status}, #{company_number}, #{signUp_time}, #{template_number}, #{association_number}, #{reviewer}, #{reviewer_number}, #{review_time})

insert into all_count_conference( company_name, contacts, job_title, contact_information, meetings_times_domestic, meetings_times_international, meetings_times_held_hK_mc_tw, participants_number_domestic, participants_number_international, participants_number_hK_mc_tw, exchange_papers_meeting_domestic, exchange_paper_conferences_international, exchange_paper_conferences_hK_mc_tw, number_of_times_professional, number_of_times_comprehensive, participants_number_professional, participants_number_comprehensive, exchange_papers_conference_professional, exchange_paper_conference_number_comprehensive, meetings_times_large, meetings_times_medium, meetings_times_small, participants_number_large, participants_number_medium, participants_number_small, exchange_papers_conference_large, exchange_papers_meeting_medium, exchange_papers_meeting_small, meetings_times_one_time, number_of_times_held_annual, number_of_events_series, participants_number_one_time, participants_number_annual, participants_number_series, exchange_paper_conferences_one_time, exchange_papers_meeting_annual, exchange_papers_meeting_series, guid, approval_status, company_number, date_of_completion, template_number, institutional_number, reviewer, reviewer_number, review_time, institutional_name ) values( #{company_name}, #{contacts}, #{job_title}, #{contact_information}, #{meetings_times_domestic}, #{meetings_times_international}, #{meetings_times_held_hK_mc_tw}, #{participants_number_domestic}, #{participants_number_international}, #{participants_number_hK_mc_tw}, #{exchange_papers_meeting_domestic}, #{exchange_paper_conferences_international}, #{exchange_paper_conferences_hK_mc_tw}, #{number_of_times_professional}, #{number_of_times_comprehensive}, #{participants_number_professional}, #{participants_number_comprehensive}, #{exchange_papers_conference_professional}, #{exchange_paper_conference_number_comprehensive}, #{meetings_times_large}, #{meetings_times_medium}, #{meetings_times_small}, #{participants_number_large}, #{participants_number_medium}, #{participants_number_small}, #{exchange_papers_conference_large}, #{exchange_papers_meeting_medium}, #{exchange_papers_meeting_small}, #{meetings_times_one_time}, #{number_of_times_held_annual}, #{number_of_events_series}, #{participants_number_one_time}, #{participants_number_annual}, #{participants_number_series}, #{exchange_paper_conferences_one_time}, #{exchange_papers_meeting_annual}, #{exchange_papers_meeting_series}, #{guid}, #{approval_status}, #{company_number}, #{date_of_completion}, #{template_number}, #{institutional_number}, #{reviewer}, #{reviewer_number}, #{review_time}, #{institutional_name})
